abstract: Stocks rise after downbeat start, with consumer companies among big gainers.
lead_paragraph: Consumer staples companies led the gainers, while telecommunications stocks lagged the rest of the market.

headline.main: Market Ticks Upward as Traders Assess Data
headline.print_headline: Market Ticks Up as Traders Assess Data

snippet: Consumer staples companies led the gainers, while telecommunications stocks lagged the rest of the market.
